organisation_name: Federation of European Film Directors - Fédération Européenne des Réalisateurs de l'Audiovisuel (FERA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Federation of European Film Directors (FERA – Fédération Européenne des Réalisateurs de l’Audiovisuel), founded in 1980, represents in Brussels the independent voice of film and TV directors as the primary creators of audiovisual works. With 36 directors associations as members from 27 countries, we speak for more than 20,000 European screen directors, representing their cultural, creative and economic interests at national and European level. FERA works to promote policies that maximize the cultural, creative, social and commercial potential of the audiovisual industry.
